title: 7 side effects of Ginger you must be aware of | The Times of India
description: Ginger is not only a flavourful ingredient but also a very popular Ayurveda herb that is helpful in treating many common ailments. From flavouring dishes to flushing out toxins, it is known for its magical benefits and that's the reason chefs and doctors both swear by it. But, you will be surprised to know that this magical ingredient can also cause side effects. While the side effects largely happen due to excessive intake of ginger, in many cases it aggravates health issues just like that. Read this piece of information to know more about the side effects of one of the fieriest roots.
